channel.title: Can't extract MoparScape on a Mac using Windows Parallels
channel.description: So basically I am using a Mac but I am using Windows Parallels which is basically the same thing as a Windows computer. I manage to install the .rar file and extract it with WinRAR btu the problem is that the tutorial image shows that you need to "extract here" and you should get a folder. When I "extraer aqui" I don't get the folder. I tried extracting the .rar filed onto a new folder but I don't get the "MS-DOS" file.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 02, 2009, 10:53:13 pm[/size][hr]Nevermind downloaded for mac better, less trouble.

item.title: Can't extract MoparScape on a Mac using Windows Parallels
item.dc:creator: @xxx123xxx xxx123xxx
item.description:
@xxx123xxx wrote:

Motagua:

So basically I am using a Mac but I am using Windows Parallels which is basically the same thing as a Windows computer. I manage to install the .rar file and extract it with WinRAR btu the problem is that the tutorial image shows that you need to “extract here” and you should get a folder. When I “extraer aqui” I don’t get the folder. I tried extracting the .rar filed onto a new folder but I don’t get the “MS-DOS” file.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 02, 2009, 10:53:13 pm[/size][hr]Nevermind downloaded for mac better, less trouble.

thats not the real window’s lol just a emulator that shows the basics of the operating system.
